title: [1508436091] Around The World In 78 Days With Mark Beaumont | Ask GCN Anything About Cycling
description:
It's a very special edition of Ask GCN Anything this week, we've got Mark Beaumont, the world record holder for circumnavigating the globe on a bicycle, here to answer all your questions! 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/qa
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/qb

Fresh off completing his record breaking ride around the globe, setting a new world record of 78 days 14 hours and 40 minutes in the process, Mark Beaumont is in the GCN studio!!

In this bumper episode Mark answers all of your questions about his record breaking ride, and they're not all about saddle sores

asset.title: Around The World In 78 Days With Mark Beaumont | Ask GCN Anything About Cycling
asset.description:
It's a very special edition of Ask GCN Anything this week, we've got Mark Beaumont, the world record holder for circumnavigating the globe on a bicycle, here to answer all your questions! 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/qa
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/qb

Fresh off completing his record breaking ride around the globe, setting a new world record of 78 days 14 hours and 40 minutes in the process, Mark Beaumont is in the GCN studio!!

In this bumper episode Mark answers all of your questions about his record breaking ride, and they're not all about saddle sores 😂

Let us know what you think of the legendary Mark Beaumont and his Guinness World Record in the comments below 👇

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍http://gcn.eu/qc

Watch more on GCN...
Watch Si ride with Mark for the first day of his challenge http://gcn.eu/atw80Days📹 
And then ride part of his final day as well http://gcn.eu/78Days 📹 

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
